string.text:
%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Ak-5C Carabine
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Set of components for the Ak-5C. Converts the standard Ak-5C into a shortened version with a staff for all occasions. The set appeared in the Zone shortly after the emergence of the ISG.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] collapsible stock
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] low profile foregrip
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] LA-5 laser aim module
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Leupold LCO red dot sight
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Leupold D'evo x6 scope
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] adjust kit to increases fire rate
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] short barrel
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Razor556 sound supressor

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] AKS-74UN
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Upgrades the standard AKS-74UN into a further compact variant, optimized for close-quarters combat. Developed by Spleen to support stalkers in fending off relentless Monolith assaults, the kit is discreetly stored in a small Sig Sauer case to maintain stealth against enemy forces.
 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] polymer handguard
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] RPK 45 rounds magazine
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] EKP-1S-03 Kobra sight
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] adjust kit to increases fire rate
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] short barrel
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] PBS-4 suppressor
